column6: Unusually sensitive individuals may experience respiratory symptoms.
column7: Unusually sensitive people should consider reducing prolonged or heavy exertion.

column6: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in persons with cardiopulmonary disease and the elderly.
column7: People with respiratory or heart disease, the elderly and children should limit prolonged exertion.

column6: Increased aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in persons with cardiopulmonary disease and the elderly; increased respiratory effects in general population.
column7: People with respiratory or heart disease, the elderly and children should avoid prolonged exertion; everyone else should limit prolonged exertion.

column6: Significant aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in persons with cardiopulmonary disease and the elderly; significant increase in respiratory effects in general population.
column7: People with respiratory or heart disease, the elderly and children should avoid any outdoor activity; everyone else should avoid prolonged exertion.

column6: Serious aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in persons with cardiopulmonary disease and the elderly; serious risk of respiratory effects in general population.
column7: Everyone should avoid any outdoor exertion; people with respiratory or heart disease, the elderly and children should remain indoors.
